scripts.check-qr-deps: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json');const expoVer=pkg.dependencies['expo'];const svgVer=pkg.dependencies['react-native-svg'];const qrVer=pkg.dependencies['react-native-qrcode-svg'];const semver=require('semver');const expoToSvg={ '53': '15.11.2', '52': '14.1.1', '51': '13.4.0', '50': '13.2.0', '49': '13.2.0', '48': '13.2.0', '47': '12.1.1', '46': '12.1.1', '45': '12.1.1' };const expoMajor=expoVer?expoVer.match(/(\d+)/)?.[1]:null;const expectedSvg=expoToSvg[expoMajor];if(!svgVer||!qrVer){console.log('❌ Missing react-native-svg or react-native-qrcode-svg in dependencies');process.exit(1);}if(expectedSvg&&svgVer!==expectedSvg){console.log(`❌ react-native-svg version (${svgVer}) does not match recommended for Expo SDK ${expoMajor} (${expectedSvg}). Run: expo install react-native-svg@${expectedSvg}`);process.exit(1);}console.log('✅ QR dependencies are compatible with Expo.\n- react-native-svg:',svgVer,'\n- react-native-qrcode-svg:',qrVer);"
